WALKING TOURS

Local artists and performers guide you on a magical journey through Paris.
Tickle Your Tastebuds

Paris is the most important culinary city in the world, and now we take you into the heart of two essential French food experiences – the Parisian market, and the Parisian café.

Secrets of the Night

Walk the tiny and winding streets of the Latin Quarter and beyond with our actor-guides, who will share the secret legends and the spookier myths of Paris.
